title: Oh Riot.
body:
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/FOhsMJB0-introducing-chroma-packs

I was going to rant but honestly all I can do is laugh.

I just want you all to know this is present in other games for free, and Riot's struggling to make their Mastery system fleshed out.

Bye.

PS http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tencent#Riot_Games
Make of that how you will :)

replies.body:
Welcome back, even if it has only been a few minutes before you would disappear once again.

Colour schemes is generally something other games have for free, like in shooters and fighting games where you either unlock them gradually or they are simply present for you to choose from the get go.

590 RP for different colour codes is stealing man, since all it really does is swapping out the colour numbers with another one, come on Riot we can do better, at least let us have the option to earn it through playing the game.

I wonder why no one understands that it costs money to produce these things, probably because half the player base is still living at home still sucking  from their mother's breast. Riot gave you the game for free so there's really no justification for being upset at bringing out new content for the game and charging a price, which makes absolutely no change to the gameplay. They pay people to work on this stuff which means they need to recoup their investment somehow.

Don't want to pay for it? Don't buy it. Pretty fucking simple but understandably difficult for self-entitled brats to understand...

A simple recolouring is in the end, just a simple recolouring.

I don't know if the recolour is simply done automatically, I shudder on the thought of it being built and sold this way, so I will give them the benefit of doubt and assume it's all manually done.

However even then, it really doesn't take long for each nor is it exhausting on capitals to redraw the colour of an virtual object.

If we're talking about every single skin this game has, then yeah I can see how it can be time consuming for the art team, but still I don't think a recolour is actually worthy of being charged, with NO ways to earn it in-game.

If you charge for skins, it's understandable, since you have to redesign the champ's appearance from ground up and colour it. Charging half price for colouring alone is just stealing.

And that's just stupid, let's be frank.

If anyone expects riot to start giving us things for free then you should re-think what there company is actually about. Sure they've made a great game (who some say has been ruined) but there not about to go and stop making money. I THINK (my opinion, not others) should play the game for what they started playing it for, enjoy playing with your friends, climbing the ranked ladder, whatever the fun you have with the game may be. Skins are cool and such but it literally makes ZERO difference to the play if the game and the fun you have.
